com.psddev.dari.util

Class AsyncProcessor<S,D>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.psddev.dari.util.Task
      • com.psddev.dari.util.AsyncConsumer<S>
        • com.psddev.dari.util.AsyncProcessor<S,D>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Task>, Runnable

    public abstract class AsyncProcessor<S,D>
extends AsyncConsumer<S>
    Background task that consumes all items from an input queue, processes them, and produces new ones into an output queue.

    Sub-classes must implement:

    • process(S)

      Optionally, they can further override:

      • AsyncConsumer.beforeStart()
      • handleError(S, java.lang.Exception)
      • finished()

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AsyncProcessor(AsyncQueue<S> input)
      Deprecated. 
      Use AsyncProcessor(String, AsyncQueue, AsyncQueue) instead.
      AsyncProcessor(AsyncQueue<S> input, AsyncQueue<D> output)
      Deprecated. 
      Use AsyncProcessor(String, AsyncQueue, AsyncQueue) instead.
      AsyncProcessor(String executor, AsyncQueue<S> input, AsyncQueue<D> output)
      Creates an instance that runs in the given executor with the given input and output queues.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void consume(S item)
      Called to consume the given item.
      protected void finished()
      Called when all consumption have finished.
      AsyncQueue<D> getOutput()
      Returns the output queue.
      protected void handleError(S item, Exception error)
      Called to handle the given error that occurred during AsyncConsumer.consume(E).
      protected abstract D process(S item)
      Called to process the given item.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AsyncProcessor

        public AsyncProcessor(String executor,
              AsyncQueue<S> input,
              AsyncQueue<D> output)
        Creates an instance that runs in the given executor with the given input and output queues.
        Parameters:
        executor - If null, uses the default executor.
        input - Can't be null.
        output - If null, creates a new queue.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the given input is null.

      • AsyncProcessor

        @Deprecated
public AsyncProcessor(AsyncQueue<S> input,
                         AsyncQueue<D> output)
        Deprecated. Use AsyncProcessor(String, AsyncQueue, AsyncQueue) instead.

public AsyncProcessor(AsyncQueue<S> input)
        Deprecated. Use AsyncProcessor(String, AsyncQueue, AsyncQueue) instead.

      • handleError

        protected void handleError(S item,
               Exception error)
        Description copied from class: AsyncConsumer
        Called to handle the given error that occurred during AsyncConsumer.consume(E). Default implementation logs the error at the WARNING level.
        Overrides:
        handleError in class AsyncConsumer<S>

      • finished

        protected void finished()
        Description copied from class: AsyncConsumer
        Called when all consumption have finished. Default implementation doesn't do anything. Sub-classes must call super.finished at the beginning of this method.
        Overrides:
        finished in class AsyncConsumer<S>
